>
[Forlorn](/Feats.aspx?ID=15) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Elf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=58" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 40 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Watching your friends age and die fills you with moroseness that protects you against harmful emotions. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60) effects. If you roll a success on a saving throw against an emotion effect, you get a critical success instead.
